text: @kylewalker2 No excuses, everybody (and this includes footballers-who are in privileged) positions, should be acting as responsible as joe bloggs off the street, stop,  and have a think about all those that have died from covid-19 who didnt even get the choice to hug loved ones.........😡😡😡
